text.section:
A waste tire program is created to manage waste tires which for the purposes of KRS 224.50-850 to 224.50-880 shall include:
Tires not used for their original, intended purpose due to wear or damage;
Used tires stored for resale; and
Processed waste tire material.
The cabinet may promulgate administrative regulations to implement the waste tire program.

law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 529, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998.
